statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); repo_name=$(basename "$project_dir"); rel_path=$(echo "$current_dir" | sed "s|$project_dir/||; s|$project_dir||"); branch=$(git -C "$project_dir" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); printf "ğŸ“ %s ğŸ“¦ %s ğŸŒ¿ %s" "${rel_path:-.}" "$repo_name" "$branch"
